name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an experienced Interoperability Engineer with 8 years in full-stack development, I possess a strong command of HL7, FHIR, SPMS services, and modern integration tools like **Apache Camel** and **Mirth Connect**. My technical expertise encompasses programming languages such as **Java** and **Python**, and I have a proven track record in applying **CI/CD** methodologies to streamline deployment processes.

I am well-versed in building robust **RESTful APIs** and utilizing both SQL (including **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**) and NoSQL (like **MongoDB**) databases for data management. My cloud experience spans across major platforms including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**. I leverage containerization technologies such as **Docker** and orchestration with **Kubernetes** for scalable application deployment.

In addition to my core interoperability skills, I have extensive experience with **Apache Kafka** for event streaming and monitoring tools like the **ELK Stack**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana** for observability. I excel in creating and executing unit tests using **JUnit** and **Mockito** to ensure application reliability. My background includes developing enterprise-grade platforms with a focus on compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, while continuously integrating AI/ML capabilities into applications for enhanced functionality.
